page.title: 19F of D Lombard R.A.C. Rally
page.content: The Rally came through the Forest of Dean and went through stage 13_Symonds Yat_Mailscot Wood_Christchurch Campsite.Hundreds of spectators came to Berry Hill to watch.Leading cars were Peugot_Timo Sullivan;Lancia Delta_Henry Toyberman;Metro Turbo_Tony Pond;They travelled up to 100 mph.Cars were scrutineered(checked)before they left Nottingham.At Christchurch Garage they changed road tyres to rally tyres.It was good driving weather.We went out to watch at night time. Suddenly you would see the lights shining through the trees.Sometimes the turbo cars backfired their engines were 100 brake horse power.Spotlights and headlights were used at night.One spectator was knocked over.The ambulance went in a ditch too!A doctor travels round with the rally all the time.
